response.explain: The previous action code has successfully put the carrot into the saucepot. Now, we need to turn on the stove to cook the carrot.
response.subtask: (1) Turn on the stove to cook the carrot.

def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 1: Turn on the stove to cook the carrot
    stove = registry(env,"stove_rgpphy_0")
    toggle_on(robot, stove)
    donothing(env)
